Question: Parker had already shifted his plans to television, where this person had not appeared since the Sinatra Timex show in 1960.
Hints: He was on the verge of quitting, until this person ordered the Hill and Range personnel out of the studio.
This person's first RCA single, "Heartbreak Hotel", released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
In 1976, RCA sent a mobile studio to Graceland that made possible two full-scale recording sessions at this person's home.
